name: Cursed Gold
description:
Cursed Gold is a 2D platformer game. It is based on old school games of this genre, but introduces lots of different enemies, which leads to a unique experience.

Edward Blackstorm, the pirate protagonist,  is looking for his father, who has dissapeared since he left home. Edward must face the force of the marine, enemy animals, evil chests and many more dangers to find out the true behind his father dissapearance, including a surprising final Boss.

The mechanics are simple; run, jump, shoot and and heal yourself to get to the end of each level. Dodge or kill the enemies and try to get as much gold as you can carry... As long as you don't die trying to get it.

The game has an OST free to listen in youtube

Most of the sprites are from "One Piece"(GBA, 2005)
